main event: A round white object, about the size of a basketball, was observed in Wellsboro, Pennsylvania on 11 July 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 15 minutes., The object remained at the same altitude for approximately 5 minutes., The object faded in the western direction after some time., Winds were blowing from the west at the time of the sighting., The observer used binoculars for the ground visual observation.
